resources.string: You are already a lifetime VIP

* You can use all the VIP functions of the MT Manager after you activate the VIP. The account is not tied to the mobile phone. You can log in to use on any mobile phone, but it does not support logging in to the same account at the same time.
* In order for the MT manager to operate well for a long time, the VIP account is limited to the purchaser himself, and it is not allowed to be shared, rented or sold publicly, otherwise the account may be permanently frozen.
* VIP content belongs to virtual goods, once purchase does not support refund operation.
* If you encounter problems during the payment process, you can write to 921558445@qq.com
